definition: roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: An old man at the counter nodded in greeting when he saw Walter.
sentences.chinese: 櫃檯後面有一個老頭看見瓦爾特進來向他點頭致意。

sentences.english: Walter jumps all over the place like a water flea .
sentences.chinese: 瓦爾特跳來跳去，活象個水蚤。

sentences.english: With young Walter, the family moved from the Midwest to Texas.
sentences.chinese: 隨着年輕的瓦爾特，全家搬到從中西部到得克薩斯州。

sentences.english: When Suchen did not speak, he asked her where she was going.
sentences.chinese: 蘇晨沒有說話，瓦爾特接着問她要去哪裏。

sentences.english: When Suchen asked the waitress for her check, Walter finally picked up his.
sentences.chinese: 蘇晨要女侍者結賬時，瓦爾特也終於付了帳。

sentences.english: Sir Walter went off to Scotland Yard to get MacGilllvray.
sentences.chinese: 瓦爾特爵士去蘇格蘭場找麥吉里夫雷。

sentences.english: Suchen apologized and said she did not watch TV, and Walter seemed disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 蘇晨表示歉意說她不看電視，瓦爾特似乎有點失望。

sentences.english: After the couple left, the man told Suchen that his name was Walter.
sentences.chinese: 老夫婦離去後，男人告訴蘇晨他的名字叫瓦爾特。

sentences.english: Walter took her to a café at the back of a gift shop.
sentences.chinese: 瓦爾特把蘇晨帶到一家禮品店後面的咖啡館。

sentences.english: 'Well, I suppose we'll have to change our plans, 'said Sir Walter unhappily.
sentences.chinese: “我想我們必須改變計劃，”瓦爾特爵士悻悻地說。

sentences.english: Here, he worked closely with Walter Schloss .
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，他密切合作瓦爾特城堡。

sentences.english: Walter said, the gentle concern in his eyes replaced by an angry and disapproving look.
sentences.chinese: 瓦爾特說，他溫和關愛的眼神已經變成憤怒和責備。

definition: made of steel/steel (bar, screw, product etc)

pinyin: dian4 nao3 fu3 zhu4 she4 ji4
